What new features have been added to the Verus blockchain, and what are their benefits? Also, what is the significance of the partnership between Verus ecosystem company Arkeytyp and Digital Nation Entertainment?

The Verus blockchain has recently added two new core protocol features: VerusID (NFT) Marketplace and Verus Vault. These features enhance the functionality and security of the Verus ecosystem.

**VerusID (NFT) Marketplace:**
The VerusID Marketplace allows users to exchange VerusIDs publicly and privately. This feature enables a decentralized and secure way to trade unique digital identities, which can represent various assets, rights, or privileges. The marketplace provides a platform for users to buy, sell, and transfer VerusIDs, promoting a thriving ecosystem around digital ownership and scarcity.

**Verus Vault:**
Verus Vault is a feature that allows users to lock funds for various purposes, including security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more. This feature provides an additional layer of security and flexibility for users, enabling them to manage their assets in a more sophisticated and customized manner. Verus Vault ensures that funds are protected and can only be accessed under specific conditions, providing peace of mind for users.

**Partnership between Arkeytyp and Digital Nation Entertainment:**
The partnership between Arkeytyp, a Verus ecosystem company, and Digital Nation Entertainment is significant because it brings together two innovative entities to create high-quality digital worlds. Digital Nation Entertainment has committed to exclusively working with Verus on the blockchain side of their metaverse environments. This partnership has already led to the creation of a digital environment for the movie The Harder They Fall (on Netflix), with the Verus community participating in the testing phase. The partnership aims to bring the metaverse into people's lives, and Arkeytyp's donation of 50% of the proceeds from this relationship to the Verus Coin Foundation further supports the growth and development of the Verus ecosystem.

Successful Mainnet Upgrade!
On Monday 29 November two new core protocol features successfully activated on the Verus blockchain. You can now use VerusID (NFT) Marketplace to exchange VerusIDs publicly and privately. And use Verus Vault to lock funds for security, vesting, trusts, inheritance, and more. [read full article here]. Exclusive Partnership Digital Nation Entertainment
Verus ecosystem company Arkeytyp signed an agreement with Digital Nation Entertainment concerning the creation of high-quality digital worlds. Digital Nation Entertainment has committed to exclusively working with Verus on the blockchain side of their metaverse environments. Arkeytyp donates 50% of the proceeds from this relationship to the Verus Coin Foundation.
Earlier this month Digital Nation Entertainment released a digital environment for the movie The Harder They Fall (on Netflix) and the Verus community helped with the testing of this metaverse. This exclusive and exciting partnership with Verus, Arkeytyp and Digital Nation Entertainment is the beginning of a combined effort to bring the metaverse into people’s lives.
